quotes.author: Von R. Glitschka
quotes.quote: The client may be king, but he's not the art director.

quotes.author: Frank Capra
quotes.quote: A hunch is creativity trying to tell you something.

quotes.author: Steven Heller
quotes.quote: As a profession, graphic designers have been shamefully remiss or ineffective about plying their craft for social or political betterment.

quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
quotes.quote: Every creator painfully experiences the chasm between his inner vision and its ultimate expression.

quotes.author: James Hague
quotes.quote: It’s extremely difficult to be simultaneously concerned with the end-user experience of whatever it is that you’re building and the architecture of the program that delivers that experience.

quotes.author: Bill Cahan
quotes.quote: We, unfortunately, live in a corporate world where group decision making is made to avoid failure rather than to achieve success.

quotes.author: Michael Stinson
quotes.quote: Letterspacing creates speedbumps for the reader.

quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway
quotes.quote: Write drunk; edit sober.

quotes.author: Milton Glaser
quotes.quote: The real issue is not talent as an independent element, but the talent in relationship to will, desire, and persistence. Talent without these things vanishes and even modest talent with those characteristics grows.

quotes.author: Ricardo Zea
quotes.quote: Learning Web Design is like playing video games: You start small and build your character as you progress, then you beat the boss, literally.

quotes.author: Charles Mingus
quotes.quote: Making the simple complicated is commonplace; making the complicated simple, awesomely simple, that’s creativity.

quotes.author: Andrew Lewis
quotes.quote: I love the comment, “You must love designing for a living.” At that point, I usually start to laugh or break into uncontrollable tears.

quotes.author: Brian Eno
quotes.quote: Instead of shooting arrows at somebody else’s target… I make my own target around wherever my arrow has happened to have landed.

quotes.author: Thomas Vasquez
quotes.quote: I’ve always held to the belief that the practice of creating compelling graphic design occurs not by employing the principals of a democracy, but rather, that of a monarchy.

quotes.author: Anton Fokker
quotes.quote: Once the problem was stated, its solution came to me in a flash.

quotes.author: Wim Crouwel
quotes.quote: You can’t do better design with a computer, but you can speed up your work enormously.

quotes.author: Bolaji Ayodeji
quotes.quote: Keep it clear, simple and light; too many designs causes distractions.

quotes.author: Seun Daramola
quotes.quote: To be relevant in the industry you MUST possess JavaScript skills as a front-end engineer. I know people who get hired earning real dollars with just sound react skills with little or no design sense. The styling part of things is something you can easily pick along the way. We must raise people who are relevant to the industry

quotes.author: Ivan Chermayeff
quotes.quote: Design is directed toward human beings. To design is to solve human problems by identifying them and executing the best solution.

quotes.author: Benjamin Cavanagh
quotes.quote: A computer without Photoshop is like a dog with no legs. Sure is fun, but you can’t really do anything with it.
